title: How Much Mechanical Energy is Dissipated

content.question: A box of mass <math alttext="m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> slides a distance <math alttext="d" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> down a rough incline from an initial height <math alttext="h" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, as shown in the figure above. The surface of the incline has a coefficient of kinetic friction <math alttext="mu" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and makes an angle <math alttext="theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with the horizontal. How much mechanical energy is dissipated as the box slides to the bottom of the incline?

choices.label: <math alttext="mu times d, times m, times g, times the cosine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="mu times d, times m, times g, times the sine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="mu times m, times g, times h" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="mu times m, times g, times d" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="mu times d, times m, times g, times the cosine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>μ</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
